channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: World's biggest chipmaker TSMC posts record 2024 revenue as AI boost continues
item.description: TSMC manufacturers semiconductors for some of the world's biggest companies from Apple to Nvidia.

item.title: Tesla reports first-ever drop in annual deliveries
item.description: Tesla's fourth-quarter deliveries report follows a huge late-year rally in the stock that lifted its gain for 2024 to 63%.

item.title: Here is our third-quarter earnings report card for 33 stocks in the portfolio
item.description: We ranked the quarterly reports of our holdings in the Club as great, good, not-so-bad and ugly.

item.title: Lucid reports record quarterly vehicle deliveries, meets production target
item.description: Lucid Group on Monday reported record quarterly vehicle deliveries for the fourth quarter and confirmed production of more than 9,000 vehicles in 2024...

item.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq Futures Fall
item.description: Stock futures were lower as Investors stayed on edge ahead of the December nonfarm payrolls report.

item.title: Wildfires and Other Disasters Push Up Home-Insurance Rates Thousands of Miles Away
item.description: With insured losses ballooning, home insurance rates in places like Vermont and Virginia are rising, too.

item.title: The U.K. Is the Biggest Loser From the Rise in Yields
item.description: The magnitude of the selloff served as a reminder that rising borrowing costs will have consequences for highly indebted governments.

item.title: U.K. Gilt Selloff Stems Only Partly from Home-Grown Problems
item.description: Ten-year gilt yields edged up and HSBC said global uncertainty and fears of sticky inflation were among the culprits behind their rise on Thursday to ...

item.title: Rivian stock has its best day ever after EV maker reports 2024 production, deliveries
item.description: Rivian on Friday said it produced 49,476 electric vehicles last year.

item.title: Euro Undervalued, Could Outperform Peers After U.S. Jobs Data
item.description: The euro was up slightly against the dollar, while ING said the European currencyâ€™s undervaluation meant it could have less scope to fall than other G...
